meeting_request.purpose: Struggling academically and uncertain first-year experience
meeting_request.description: Hi, my name is Sandra and I'm a first-year student in Romance Languages major. I’ve taken undergraduate courses in Spanish and French, and I’ve been doing okay in classes like literature and language theory, but I’ve never really been in a high-stakes environment like this one. My major is still being evaluated, and I’m still in the first semester. I feel overwhelmed by the workload and uncertain about how to succeed. I’m struggling with grades, feeling isolated, and questioning if I’m even cut out for this major. I’d like some guidance on how to improve academically and how to navigate this new environment.
